short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for some tools in the Deep Space Airships (drednot.io) game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Dredark Tools (SDT) adds convenience tools to Deep Space Airships. It does not provide in-game advantages that could be considered cheating. Everything is toggleable. Works in both the main and test games.

Please make sure to read the guide page that will appear upon installation. The screenshots are slightly outdated.
▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔
- Hotkey to quickly change cannon firing mode setting (continuous/volley).

- Save favorite outfits (up to 12) and wear any of them with just one click. The saved outfits won't be lost when the browser is closed.

- Automatically and quickly set properties of in-game blocks to predefined values. This only applies to signs and doors. Support for 3 other items was removed after the game introduced the built-in config clipboard feature.

- Make URLs in the chat and ship MOTD clickable.
  - Allow interacting with the clickable URLs in the chat without opening the chat.

- Highlight specified texts in the chat.
  - Play a sound when a specified text is mentioned in the chat.

- Remove the trust warning message (move it to crew control), and shorten the "you are a captain" message in the chat.
